tax.faq3: What if I use other crypto services?

earn.title: Earn
earn.description: Earn rewards on your crypto holdings.
earn.subtitle: Get rewards on your crypto.
earn.legalDisclaimerText1: Digital/virtual currencies are not bank deposits, are not legal tender, are not backed by the government, and accounts and value balances are not subject to US Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation or Securities Investor Protection Corporation or any other non-US governmental or government-backed protections.
earn.legalDisclaimerText2: Legislative and regulatory changes or actions at the US State, Federal, or international level may adversely affect the use, transfer, exchange, and value of digital/virtual currencies.
earn.viewPassiveDesc: View available Passive positions and deposit to start earning.
earn.viewStakingDesc: View available Staking positions and deposit to start earning.
earn.viewActiveDesc: View available Active positions and deposit to start earning.
earn.secureEarnDesc: Your crypto is held with institutional-grade security while you earn.
earn.step1Desc: Select staking, flexible, or locked rewards based on your goals.
earn.step2Desc: Transfer your crypto to start earning rewards.
earn.step3Desc: Rewards are paid out automatically to your account.

activeRewardsLearn.whatIsDesc: Active Rewards lets you earn rewards by forecasting the price of crypto. Payouts settle every Friday at 8:00 AM UTC.
activeRewardsLearn.benefitsDesc: Active Rewards offers a higher rewards rate than Passive Rewards, Staking Rewards, or simply holding crypto.
activeRewardsLearn.risksDesc: While Active Rewards offers fixed weekly rewards, market movements may reduce your crypto balance.
activeRewardsLearn.howItWorksDesc: Every week, Active Rewards sets a trigger price for crypto assets that is higher than the market price. If you believe the price will be under the trigger price at the end of the week, you can subscribe to a strategy that pays weekly rewards at an annual rate.
activeRewardsLearn.scenario1: Scenario 1 - Price of BTC is at or lower than trigger price.
activeRewardsLearn.scenario1Desc: You will receive your rewards for the week and be re-subscribed for the next week.

compare.title: Compare Products
compare.activeDesc: Earn rewards by forecasting the market.

products.rewardsDesc: Earn up to 5% on supported assets with no lock-up.
products.flexibleDesc: Earn with the flexibility to withdraw anytime.
